    An active bundle for a particular BeamFnApi.ProcessBundleDescriptor.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Blocks till bundle processing is finished. This is comprised of:
        • closing the input receiver.
        • waiting for the SDK to say that processing the bundle is finished.
        • waiting for all inbound data clients to complete

        This method will throw an exception if bundle processing has failed. Throwable.getSuppressed() will return all the reasons as to why processing has failed.

        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface RemoteBundle<InputT>
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
